title: Kevin Volland: Who is the Union Berlin forward with a better record than Kai Havertz? | Bundesliga
snippet: Taking and making chances is the name of the game for Kevin Volland - but what else is there to know about the experienced forward now on the books of Union Berlin? ... Age: 31 (born: 30 July 1992) Club: Union Berlin Position: Forward Country: Germany (15 caps/ one goal) ... Volland's record speaks for itself: 77 goals and 62 assists across 247 Bundesliga appearances for Hoffenheim and Bayer Leverkusen. The 5'9" forward also had a direct hand in 50 goals in 86 Ligue 1 games for Monaco between 2020 and 2023.
